Description: I hate to see this one go. Korean ESP, at the height of their craftsmanship. Untested All items sold as is,Few hours home playing time on this (for real, original crap strings), 25 more guitars to be posted for sale: no reserve, most are like this- pretty much new, all have some minor flaw/ding or other- I will describe flaws. these are tough to photograph- glare, reflections, dust, fingerprints...but they will polish nice. Photo shows condition- took few angles to reduce glare questions. this needs: New strings/setup and new 9v battery for active pickup. Take care of her. I forget which EMG 81/85?? Not positive- bone stock. ESP LTD EC-1000QM EMG - See Thru Blue W/ MOP inlay trimSolibody Electric Guitar with Mahogany Body, Quilt Maple Top, Maple Neck, Rosewood Fretboard, 2 EMG active Pickups, See Thru Blue Rated 4.5/5 Classic looks with modern performanceNothing screams rock 'n' roll like ESP's timeless Eclipse body style. The extra mass of this mahogany and maple, single-cutaway design gives the Eclipse EC-1000 Piezo fantastic sustain. Its slightly arched quilt maple top provides you with comfortable hand positioning and a beautiful instrument to behold. Add open access to the Eclipse EC-1000 upper frets, thanks to a super-sharp cutaway, and you have an instrument that blends a favored vintage design with modern appointments — perfect for today's players. ESP LTD Eclipse EC-1000 EMG Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:Classic-looking electric guitar with piezo and magnetic pickup tones Thin "U" profile makes the mahogany neck play fast and smoothMahogany body topped with quilted maple gives you rich, powerful tone with excellent snap and definitionTonepros locking bridge/tailpiece give you dependable tuning stability and intonationSet-neck construction provides long-lasting sustain and excellent articulation We do not accept P.O. BOXES - PLEASE PROVIDE A PHYSICAL ADDRESS. Am human, make errors. I fix. Beep Bop. I am NOT Amazon, more like garage sale.
Title: ESP LTD EMG Active QM See-thru Blue Electric Guitar (LECEMGQMSTB)
